thread.title: BRIEF-Brazil's Cremer says new owner CM Hospitalar to buy out minority shareholders, request delisting-filing

title: BRIEF-Brazil's Cremer says new owner CM Hospitalar to buy out minority shareholders, request delisting-filing
text: 51 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Brazil's Cremer says new owner CM Hospitalar to buy out minority shareholders, request delisting-filing Reuters Staff 1   Cremer Sa: * BRAZILIAN HEALTHCARE PRODUCTS SUPPLIER CREMER SAYS ANTITRUST WATCHDOG APPROVED SALE OF COMPANY’S CONTROL TO CM HOSPITALAR- FILING * BRAZIL’S CREMER SAYS CM HOSPITALAR WILL MAKE BUYOUT OFFER TO MINORITY SHAREHOLDERS, REQUEST DELISTING OF COMPANY * BRAZIL’S CREMER SAYS CM HOSPITALAR HAS NOT YET DEFINED PRICE OR CONDITIONS TO THE OFFER- FILING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Tatiana Bautzer)
